cause.description:
Support the National Women's Studies Association (NWSA)!
You can visit www.nwsa.org to learn more about this non-profit organization that supports practitioners and students in the women's and gender studies field and related specialities.
1. NWSA supports and promotes feminist research and education.
2. In its endeavors, NWSA works to end racism and all forms of oppression.
3. In today’s political climate, feminist voices, ideas, and action offer needed correctives, re-framing public debates that frequently turn on gender myths and assumptions.
cause.mission: Provide a network and community to sustain feminist thought and action.
cause.name: National Women's Studies Association
